entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
